variable.label: Short Address
variable.tooltip: Only if CV29, Bit5=0 CV1

variable.label: Starting Voltage
variable.tooltip: Determines the starting speed (1-75). CV2

variable.label: Acceleration
variable.tooltip: This value multiplied by 0.869 gives the time from stop to maximum speed (0-64). CV3

variable.label: Deceleration
variable.tooltip: This value multiplied by 0.869 gives the time from maximum speed to stop (0-64). CV4

variable.label: Maximum Speed
variable.tooltip: Maximum speed of locomotive (0-64). CV5

variable.label: Medium speed
variable.tooltip: Speed of locomotive at medium speed step (0-64). CV6

variable.label: Software Version Number
variable.tooltip: The decoder version number (read only) CV7

variable.label: Manufacturer ID
variable.tooltip: The manufacturer's ID number (read only) CV8

variable.label: Consist Address Active For FL in Forward
Consist Address Active For FL in Reverse
Consist Address Active For F9 in Forward
Consist Address Active For F10 in Forward
Consist Address Active For F9 in Reverse
Consist Address Active For F10 in Reverse
Direction of Travel
variable.tooltip: Sets the relative direction of the loco when told to move forward CV29

variable.label: Speed Steps
variable.tooltip: Sets the speed step mode. 128 speed steps are recognized automatically CV29

variable.label: Analogue mode
variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco can operate on conventional DC current (enables Power Source Conversion) CV29

variable.label: Selection of speed curve
variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco will use manufacturer's internal or user-defined speed step table CV29

variable.label: Selection of address
variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco will use short or long address CV29

variable.label: Function key triggered at each change of function status
Control reference
variable.tooltip: Determines the back EMF that the motorshould supply at maximum speed (0-80). CV53

variable.label: Load control parameter K
variable.tooltip: Determines how strongly load control effects (0-80). CV54

variable.label: Load control parameter I
variable.tooltip: Determines the momentum of the motor (0-80). CV55

variable.label: Load control influence
variable.tooltip: Determines up to how many % of the speed load control is active (0-64). CV56

variable.label: Forward Trim
variable.tooltip: Divided by 128 results in the factor, with which the motor voltage is multiplied in forward mode (0-255). CV66

variable.label: Reverse Trim
variable.tooltip: Divided by 128 results in the factor, with which the motor voltage is multiplied in reverse mode (0-255). CV95

variable.label: Blinking frequency
variable.tooltip: Frequency of Strobe effects. Always a multiple of 65,536 ms (4-64). CV112

variable.label: Brightness Headlights
variable.tooltip: Range 0-15, Brightness: dark-maximum (Pulse: 0.5-8 seconds). CV113

variable.label: Brightness Back up lights
variable.tooltip: Range 0-15, Brightness: dark-maximum (Pulse: 0.5-8 seconds). CV114

variable.label: Brightness AUX1
variable.tooltip: Range 0-15, Brightness: dark-maximum (Pulse: 0.5-8 seconds)(Coupler hold power:none-full track power). CV115

variable.label: Brightness AUX2
variable.tooltip: Range 0-15, Brightness: dark-maximum (Pulse: 0.5-8 seconds)(Coupler hold power:none-full track power). CV116

variable.label: Brightness AUX3
variable.tooltip: Range 0-15, Brightness: dark-maximum (Pulse: 0.5-8 seconds). CV117

variable.label: Brightness AUX4
variable.tooltip: Range 0-15, Brightness: dark-maximum (Pulse: 0.5-8 seconds). CV118

variable.label: Brightness AUX5
variable.tooltip: Range 0-15, Brightness: dark-maximum (Pulse: 0.5-8 seconds). CV119

variable.label: Brightness AUX6
variable.tooltip: Range 0-15, Brightness: dark-maximum (Pulse: 0.5-8 seconds). CV120

variable.label: Bit for incorrect travel (Motorola)
variable.tooltip: Applies to Motorola only. CV124

variable.label: Saves the status of function buttons
variable.tooltip: Determines, which data are to be saved and used after an interruption of the power supply. CV124

variable.label: Saves the current speed setting
variable.tooltip: Determines, which data are to be saved and used after an interruption of the power supply. CV124

variable.label: Emergency stop when changing direction in Motorola mode
Motor PWM when running in analog mode
PWM for function outputs in analog mode
Analogue DC starting voltage
variable.tooltip: Range 0-127. CV125

variable.label: Analogue DC maximum speed
variable.tooltip: Range 0-127. CV126

variable.label: Analogue AC starting voltage
variable.tooltip: Range 0-127. CV127

variable.label: Analogue AC maximum speed
variable.tooltip: Range 0-127. CV128

Start delay
variable.tooltip: Delays the start (range 0-255). Allows synchronized starting of locos with LokSound decoders (for consist operation). CV253

variable.label: Constant brake distance
variable.tooltip: Determines the brake distance which will be maintained regardless of the speed of the train. Range 0-64. CV254

factReset.label: HARD RESET all CVs reset to default values
